name: The Survival Test VR: Defend To Death
description: “The Survival Test VR: Defend To Death” is a horror defensive shooting game. You have been placed in various dangerous scenes accept survive test ,you will survive or die.
minimum_requirements: OS: WIN7/WIN10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: WIN10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 Storage: 4 GB available space
